title: Tour de France ticker: Caleb Ewan headlines Lotto-Dstny, FDJ leave Démare home to back Gaudu, Pinot, Uno-X names debut Tour roster
content:
Follow all the Tour de France hype ahead of the Bilbao 'grand départ' on July 1.

Read the full article at Tour de France ticker: Caleb Ewan headlines Lotto-Dstny, FDJ leave Démare home to back Gaudu, Pinot, Uno-X names debut Tour roster on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
